entry.title: WebSharper UI.Next Version 0.1.31.32
entry.summary: WebSharper UI.Next Version 0.1.31.32 has been released, with bugfixes, and new event & animation functionality.

entry.title: WebSharper UI.Next: Animating Single-Page Applications
entry.summary: WebSharper.UI.Next provides a powerful declarative animation system. This mini-blog shows how to integrate this with single-page sites and flowlets.

entry.title: Structuring Web Applications with WebSharper.UI.Next
entry.summary: In this post, we see how WebSharper.UI.Next may be used to structure single-page applications with multiple sub-pages, and how this can be integrated with URL synchronisation.

entry.title: WebSharper.UI.Next: An Introduction
entry.summary: In this blog, we introduce an experimental UI library for the WebSharper web framework, and illustrate this by means of a small example.
